scripts.build: npm run build-react && npm run build-vue
scripts.release:patch:react: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'auto deploy' && git push origin master && cd react && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.release:minor:react: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'auto deploy' && git push origin master && cd react && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:major:react: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'auto deploy' && git push origin master && cd react && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.release:patch:vue: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'auto deploy' && git push origin master && cd vue && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.release:minor:vue: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'auto deploy' && git push origin master && cd vue && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:major:vue: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'auto deploy' && git push origin master && cd vue && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:patch:react && npm run release:patch:vue
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:minor:react && npm run release:minor:vue
scripts.release:major: npm run release:major:react && npm run release:major:vue
